title: Looking For NEW LVL30 players to join a new ranked team (Need Top and Adc)
body:
Starting a new team and looking for a TOP and ADC player
Please leave a comment

replies.body: hi can I join username boyde
If your still looking for a top laner I main darius, jax and rengar and can play an array of top champions including tryndamere, olaf and aatrox hit me up if your interested.
Still need a top or Adc?
ill adc. hit me up on my main - Conretto
